Summary: Huge Object , larger than the football field where I was passing, blue and green lights with lots of chrome looking features and glass.....
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home from the meeting with my friend and dropped her off at her home...She saw it..and ran to tell her family...I drove home and it shot past me like a bullet...I am exmilitary, retired nurse, And that expierence scared me too death!!!I was shapped like a huge disc but had windows or like windows all around the front of it....then they started flashing red, blue and green....I didn't see any white lights like a plane would have and it made no sound at all!!!What really amaized me was it stopping dead and not moving with no sound not even a whoose!!
